SELECT NVL(MAX(calendarno), 0)+1 as calendarno FROM calendar
INSERT INTO calendar(calendarno, labeldate, label, title, content, cnt, rdate) VALUES(#{calendarno}, #{labeldate}, #{label}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT calendarno, labeldate, label, title, content, cnt, rdate FROM calendar ORDER BY calendarno DESC
